projects.title: Project 1: E-commerce Backend
projects.content: Built a full-stack e-commerce platform using React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Features include user authentication, payment processing, and inventory management.

projects.title: Project 2: Task Management App
projects.content: Developed a collaborative task management application with real-time updates using Socket.io. Includes drag-and-drop functionality and team collaboration features.

projects.title: Project 3: Movie Revenue Prediction
projects.content:
A machine learning project that forecasts a movieâ€™s box office earnings, leveraging metadata (budget, cast, 
genre), audience sentiment (reviews, social media trends) backed by CRISP-DM methodology.

projects.title: Project 4: GatorCan
projects.content: Developed a full-stack scalable educational platform enabling seamless course management, assignment submissions, and real-time collaboration for students and instructors, in Golang (gin), React.js, and SQLite.
